actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to extend and amend laws relating to housing and urban development.

summary.text: Extends the definition of "housing" under Title V of the Housing Act of 1949 to include mobile homes. Authorizes loans for such housing and prescribes minimum property standards for the site on which such home will be located.

titles.title: A bill to extend and amend laws relating to housing and urban development.
